Dash in those directions and the Crystal Heart will appear. ### Strawberry \#10 Continuing to go to the right, after the room with the secret passage in the center, hop on the spring and break the block in the upper left corner. Inside is a room with two green crystals, a spiked floor, Strawberry #10, AND the passage to the next collectible piece of fruit. Use the crystals to make it to the far wall, wait for them to regenerate and then return safely to the right side of the screen with the fruit. ### Strawberry \#11 In the same room as Strawberry #10, climb the right-hand wall to reach the sole platform. Jump out into the middle and dash upward to find a new screen. Climb through this room, using the falling blocks and the geared platform to make it to the top. In the following room, you’ll spot the strawberry. Dash and climb your way to the brown platform. Drop down to the strawberry and dash in between the spikes to collect the green crystal. With your dash restored, dash diagonally upward to safety. ### Strawberry \#12 Advance a few couple more rooms until you reach the room with the floating column topped with spikes in the center. Before leaving the room by going to the right, there are two other rooms that house strawberries. One of them is at the top and the other is at the bottom. Using the column in the center, climb up to the platform in the left corner to regain your dash. Hop to the right side of the column and then leap to the disappearing b

It is NOT collected and will return to it's original location if you die. Collected A strawberry will be collected once you touch the ground for a short amount of time. When you collect a strawberry it will disappear with a flash showing '1000' (like arcade points) and will also add to your strawberry total in the top left of the screen. not easy to 100% this game, but that’s where we come in! Our strawberry guides aim to outline every single strawberry that you can find with images and the occasional video (for when it just gets too complicated to explain with words). So, let’s get into it, shall we? ### Strawberry \#1 ![Celeste Strawberry 1](https://i0.wp.com/switchaboo.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/2018022716274900-75A32021BE3512D7AA96B2D72F764411.jpg?w=1280&ssl=1) For this first strawberry, jump onto the spring button. Once you are airborne, veer off to the left so that you are directly underneath the strawberry and then dash upwards. This one may seem easy, but trust me, they get harder. [iframe](https://www.youtube.com/embed/01vmyxpt2xg?feature=oembed) ### Strawberry \#2 ![Celeste Strawberry 2](https://i1.wp.com/switchaboo.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/2018022716300800-75A32021BE3512D7AA96B2D72F764411.jpg?w=1280&ssl=1) Make your way over to the right side of the screen. Drop down, and without using your dash, hold ZR and grab onto the lower part of the right wall. When you’re ready, kick off from the wall, grab the strawberry and then use your boost to grab onto the wall that is parallel to the one that you just jumped from. Make your way back up by jumping from one side to the other until you are back up on the flat surface that you initially jumped off of. [iframe](https://www.youtube.com/embed/RBj4MXUFXeI?feature=oembed) ### Strawberry \#3 ![Celeste Strawberry 3](https://i1.wp.com/switcha

level, as well as the locations for the cassette tape and the Crystal Heart. ## Start ### Strawberry \#1 The first strawberry is right out in the open on the second screen of the chapter. Use the spring to gain height and dash into the strawberry. Touch the ground to lock it in! ### Strawberry \#2 On the screen immediately after the first strawberry is the second! Drop down from the platform above the fruit to grab it and dash into the wall to recover. Climb and wall jump back up to safety! ### Strawberry \#3 This strawberry is the first flying strawberry you see. You cannot dash on this screen or you’ll scare it away. Use the platforms on the right to get above the flying fruit and drop down to collect it. ### Strawberry \#4 The screen above the flying strawberry, go to the room on the left with the glowing light first. Jump and dash upward to make it to the landing in the middle. You can grab the wall if you need to climb up. Using the spring, hop over the spikes and fall gracefully downward, using your dash to collect the strawberry and land safely. ### Strawberry \#5 The screen above the flying strawberry, use the lift on the right to fling yourself up and to the left. Use your dash to grab the strawberry in the upper left corner. ### Strawberry \#6 In the same room as Strawberry #5 is a breakable block in the lower right corner. Dash through it to find the sixth strawberry’s location. Drop through the spikes and dash to the geared platform. Ride it and jump

From there, jump and grab onto the wall on the right and then kick off and dash upwards to land on the wooden platform. Then, jump onto the spring and maneuver your way over the spikes and fall between the other spikes through that narrow gap. Be careful when you fall, because if you keep falling, you’re going to land on the spikes down the bottom. What you want to do is use your dash at the last second and dash right to the strawberry and to safety. Using the upward geared platform, jump and dash into the small crevice next to the up arrow sign. This reveals the passage to the left corner. To clear this room, you need to overcome two geared platform obstacles. Wall jump to reach the top of the first, grab on to activate it and then quickly let go and dash over the spikes. Grab the second block and ride it all the way to the left. Climb in the small alcove above and let the platform pass beneath you. Climb onto the left side of the block and ride it back over. Wall jump your way out and go left. Dash through the air onto the only platforms until you reach the satellite where the strawberry is. ### Crystal Heart Stick around at the satellite to find Chapter 1’s Crystal Heart. Now that you’re back, jump into the hidden area that we found before (just above where the sign was), make your way up and through to the next frame. Now if you look closely at this one, you can see that there is a crumbly wall in the top-left hand corner of the frame (all those years of playing Zelda has finally paid off!). Jump onto the spring and dash onto the platform. Dash into the wall and reveal another hidden area. ![Celeste Strawberry 15](https://i1.wp.com/switchaboo.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/2018022717474400-75A32021BE3512D7AA96B2D72F764411.jpg?w=1280&ssl=1) This strawberry looks pretty self-explanatory, but in case you can’t figure it out, jump to the left and dash up-left, picking up the diamonds and dashing again until you get the strawberry. walls of spikes at the top of the screen. Use the momentum of the upward moving geared platforms in the room to launch close to the fruit and then dash upward to nab it. In the next room, use the blade of grass as a marker for how long your dash is. Dash to the spring on the floor and use its lift to safely dash to the wooden platform above. Drop down to the ledge with the green sign and then climb out of this room. Outside is the strawberry. Drop down to get it and then climb back up the wall to get to solid ground. ### Cassette Tape Back in the room with the geared platform in the floor, use its upward momentum to fling you to the gr

Use the green crystals to make your way up and around the spikes, grabbing the strawberry along the way. ###
